channel.title: SpawnScape 614 PvP (Source/Client)
channel.description:
First time posting a thread on this section ^_^ (I don't know how to make the thread look amazing)
Anyway,
A big thanks to DeliriumX for leaking the source & I don't want people selling my source.
Nothing else to say about that...
Server was shut down Feb 2013 due to legal issues with Jagex.
The server had 350+ players online and a very active community on the forums/server.
If there are any errors with the source just pm me or leave a reply on this thread and I will tell you how to fix them.
features:
- Teleport Interface
- Skull PvP Lvling System
- Starter Interface
- Custom Mage Arena Zone (No Range)
- Thieving
- Shops
- PvP
- Spawning/Selling
- Dicing
- Cash/Shard Eco
- Account Logs
- Commands
- Magic
- Custom Portals at Home
- Custom Multi Donator Zone
- Donator Ranks
- Custom Names
- Custom Levels
- Custom Hit Splat (600+ Damage)
- Fixed max cash stack resetting at 2147m
- Godsword Specs
- Safe PvP at Home
- Unsafe PvP in other areas
- Custom Auto Restart Messages
- Server Messages
- Donation System
- Voting System
- MySQL
- ScanIP command
- Trading
Trying to think of more features
[img]http://i.imgur.com/b0Lem.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/K2iv1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4Fvvy.png[/img]
questions:
Q: How do I change the IP of the client? A: launch.java then compile
Q: How do I make myself admin? A: Frames.java - Ctrl+R "jet_kai" with "your_name"
Q: How can I use the admin commands? A: Packets.java - Ctrl+R "jet_kai" with "your_name"
Q: How do I jar the client (this is not an auto cache downloading client)? A: Download JarMaker and set the main class as launch (the jar will only work with the cache614 folder in its location) Link: JARMaker.zip
Q: Where can I get an auto cache downloading client? A: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape...rd-saving.html
Q: How do I change the custom lvl/name colour/emote of my character? A: Gpi.java and Ctrl+F renderemote (this is where you change the npc emote of the player) you should see the <col> and <shad> codes there, just change them
Q: How do I check my JDK version? A: 1) C:/Program Files/Java/JDK_Version_Here 2) C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/JDK_Version_Here
Q: I have no JDK! Where can I get it from? A: Java SE Downloads
Q: How do my friends connect to the server A: Looks like a nice tutorial here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape...ailed-tut.html
links
Source (1): *
You need to add this to the client when you download it http://www.rune-server.org/runescape...crash-fix.html
Client (1): *

item.title: SpawnScape 614 PvP (Source/Client)
item.dc:creator: @Smudgerx360 Smudgerx360
item.description:
@Smudgerx360 wrote:

[quote=“KAJ0, post:1, topic:523280”]First time posting a thread on this section (I don’t know how to make the thread look amazing)

Anyway,

A big thanks to DeliriumX for leaking the source & I don’t want people selling my source.

Nothing else to say about that…

Server was shut down Feb 2013 due to legal issues with Jagex.

The server had 350+ players online and a very active community on the forums/server.

If there are any errors with the source just pm me or leave a reply on this thread and I will tell you how to fix them.

features:

  • Teleport Interface

  • Skull PvP Lvling System

  • Starter Interface

  • Custom Mage Arena Zone (No Range)

  • Thieving

  • Shops

  • PvP

  • Spawning/Selling

  • Dicing

  • Cash/Shard Eco

  • Account Logs

  • Commands

  • Magic

  • Custom Portals at Home

  • Custom Multi Donator Zone

  • Donator Ranks

  • Custom Names

  • Custom Levels

  • Custom Hit Splat (600+ Damage)

  • Fixed max cash stack resetting at 2147m

  • Godsword Specs

  • Safe PvP at Home

  • Unsafe PvP in other areas

  • Custom Auto Restart Messages

  • Server Messages

  • Donation System

  • Voting System

  • MySQL

  • ScanIP command

  • Trading

Trying to think of more features

b0Lem.png781×541

K2iv1.png781×541

4Fvvy.png781×541

questions:

Q: How do I change the IP of the client?
A: launch.java then compile

Q: How do I make myself admin?
A: Frames.java - Ctrl+R “jet_kai” with “your_name”

Q: How can I use the admin commands?
A: Packets.java - Ctrl+R “jet_kai” with “your_name”

Q: How do I jar the client (this is not an auto cache downloading client)?
A: Download JarMaker and set the main class as launch (the jar will only work with the cache614 folder in its location)
Link: JARMaker.zip

Q: Where can I get an auto cache downloading client?
A: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape...rd-saving.html

Q: How do I change the custom lvl/name colour/emote of my character?
A: Gpi.java and Ctrl+F renderemote (this is where you change the npc emote of the player)
you should see the and codes there, just change them

Q: How do I check my JDK version?
A:

  1. C:/Program Files/Java/JDK_Version_Here
  2. C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/JDK_Version_Here

Q: I have no JDK! Where can I get it from?
A: Java SE Downloads

Q: How do my friends connect to the server
A: Looks like a nice tutorial here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape...ailed-tut.html

links

Source (1): https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/...4%20Source.zip

You need to add this to the client when you download it http://www.rune-server.org/runescape...crash-fix.html

Client (1): https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/...e%20Client.zip[/quote]

This is not yours to release on Moparscape’ its Jet Kai’s and Jet Kai only uses Rune-Server
#RequestDelete.

Read full topic
